task.summary: Corrections in writing data into matrices.
Change folders' structure, add scripts for similarity structure analysis, small corrections in make_pit-diagnoses.
Set outdir the same as indir if it is not given as the parameter.
Correct error in sh files: adding 'fi'
Making shared_snps.py, moving some functions from boruta_classification to a new file corporate_funcs.py.
Correction of importing exceptions package by scripts in different directory.
Correction of writing the genome_stats file.
Adding two parameters to prepreparing file.
Removing all_snps and Queue q from boruta_classification.
Scripts for similar subset of patients.
Changing structure of folders for output files.
Correction of parsing perc values from command parameters.
Adding option of CV classification in boruta_classification.
Adding method for finding crossed SNPs.
Adding 'in progress' prompt in runs files.
Adding get_snps_locations script which rewrites selected SNPs to bed file.
Adding AUC score option in boruta_classification.
